body.name: Etekcity Bathroom Scale for Body Weight, Digital Weighing Machine for People, Accurate & Large LCD Backlight Display, 6mm Tempered Glass, 400 lbs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs
features: First-Rate Quality: Don't settle for less. As the no.1 selling brand of body weight scales in the US, Etekcity is known for innovative and high-performing products. (Source: Stackline/Retail Intelligence, U.S. Amazon Data Market Share, February 2019-2021)

Consistent Accuracy: Benefit from 10 years of professional experience. Trusted by over 5 million customers, we take pride in our high-precision sensors—the core technology that's responsible for the accuracy of body weight scales

Easy to Use: The scale is equipped with an easy-to-read display with automatic on/off, low battery, and overload indications. Choose between 2 units of measurement (lb/kg) for your weighing convenience
Minimal Design: Never Let a scale ruin your style. Place this scale in your bathroom, bedroom, or living room. It will complement the design of your living space

A Durable Choice: The scale’s 6-mm tempered glass platform provides exceptional durability and comfort. Equipped with a supportive frame and anti-skid paddings to prevent slipping, you can rely on the sturdiness of our scale
Large Platform: Step onto the scale comfortably with its large 11.9 x 11.9-inch platform
body.description: RELIABLE READINGS in an instant—step on the large platform and receive accurate measurements in pounds or kilograms. Specifications: 1. Weigh up to 400lb / 180kg. 2. PRECISION BUILT with 4 high-precision sensors, delivering results with a 0.2lb / 3oz. 3. Accuracy resolution cleanly displayed on an easy-to-read LCD screen. 4. TEMPERED STRENGTH: Built with a thick and durable 6 mm clear tempered glass platform resilient enough to provide years of fitness tracking. Note: 1.Check the scale before using. Do not use the scale if it is damaged. 2.Do not strike or bang on the scale and do not use the scale if there is a slight crack on the glass. Due to the nature of tempered glass, the glass will shatter if there is a slight crack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suprised....in a good way
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new scale to replace my aging one and I found this offering. Hesitantly I purchased it since the price was right and I figured even if I get 3 months use out of it, I would be satisfied. But, to my surprise, the physical unit is actually well made, with precision and quality materials. Another plus is the lightweight design and sleek look. I tested the VeSync app and that as well is actually pretty well designed, with an easy to understand interface to navigate with. the Bluetooth connectivity is streamline and very response. I am using an android based phone.Overall, I would highly recommend this product after testing it. You really can't go wrong with this item. It's nice to see some companies still stay competitive while offering a great product at affordable price which is build with a quality mindset.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great scale that I got at a great price! Super sturdy and nice looking. Easy to use, bright and clear, and appears to be greatly accurate. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking and accurate
reviews.reviewText: This scale is light weight, classy to look at, and easy to use. I love that you can just step on it and it works, you don't have to wait for anything or step on and off like some scales.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The scale is very slender in size and it matches any bathroom decor. Works well and it’s worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to read and don't need battery's
reviews.reviewText: The scale came in a tightly packaged box, nothing was broken or damaged. As soon as I unpacked the scale I used it right away and didn't have to worry about adding battery's which was really nice since I always forget them. I live in an apartment so the scale doesn't take up that much room and supper light if I want to move it around. It has bright lights so you can see the number on the scale. Its fast and easily to use, all you do is just step on the scale and it tells you the weight in seconds. I was nervous about getting something that was too cheap thinking that it wouldn't work but I LOVE it and I love how clean it looks to go with my esthetic of my apartment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Digital Scale!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed with the scale the minute I pulled it out of the box. It is very well made and is very sharp looking for a scale!! I have found it to be very accurate and the numbers are very easy to read. When I am done with it, I just slide it underneath my dresser where it stays until I need to use it again. This is a great product for the money. You will not be disappointed!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: recently upgraded to a new digital bathroom scale, and it has completely transformed my morning routine. This sleek, modern scale is not only a visually appealing addition to my bathroom decor but also impressively accurate. The large, easy-to-read digital display eliminates any guesswork, displaying my weight down to the decimal, making it easier to track even the smallest changes in my body weight. What I particularly love is its smart connectivity feature; it syncs effortlessly with my fitness app, allowing me to monitor my progress over time and stay motivated on my health journey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for myself a while back, the clear glass platform is sturdy, the scale is accurate and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Highly recommended.
The display on the scale is clear and easy to read.It is nice looking, and can be stored anywhere
Es lo que estaba buscando, una báscula bonita, te da el peso correcto, sin variaciones, y súper fácil de usar. Ya viene con las pilas y se puede usar en forma de Kg o libras
